comment: Mimics <leader>w (change window) by focusing the next editor group.
Mimics <leader>h (vertical split) by splitting the editor vertically.
Mimics <leader>p (NvimTreeToggle) by toggling the file explorer.
Mimics <leader>lf (LSP format) by formatting the document.
Mimics <C-a> (select all) by selecting all text in the editor.
